Name: Dog Sled Saga
About the game: As a rookie musher, foster a dogsledding team whose skills will grow if they're treated right. Week by week, get to know your dogs' unique traits, and carve your story into the trails of the Mount St. Something region. Dog Sled Saga has a pick-up-and-play dogsled racing. Each dog's speed is hindered by hunger. Lob a limited supply of food to them to keep at full speed. Hazards on the track await. By the time you reach the top league, youâ€™ll need to: Budget monthly league expenses Hire and fire dogs Leverage fame to earn sponsorship deals Bring on employees for multitasking Breed puppies and more. Features: Pick-up-and-play racing Deep team management simulation Unique dogs with varying attributes and conditions True pixel-grid art style with frame-by-frame animation Multi-platform save sync via Drive Gamepad support
